website_summaries.verdict: This organic supplement delivers 800 milligrams of calcium-magnesium from plant-based sources.
pros: Some users report this supplement also helps ease constipation
Calcium and vitamin D supplements can improve bone density
This supplement includes D3 as well as vitamin K2 MK-7 to help with absorption
cons: Some consumers report shipments arrive with several broken tablets inside the bottle

customer_reviews.title: Strong bones, strong me
customer_reviews.text: This brand was recommended to me by someone whose opinion I highly value when it comes to nutrition. I take a calcium supplement, eat well balanced meals, and exercise regularly. Imagine my disappointment when I had a bone density test and was diagnosed with osteopenia so I began researching calcium supplements until my head was ready to explode. .All calcium supplements are not created equal and some brands are loaded with fillers that might even be harmful. These are plant based so my expectation is I will not have any adverse side effects and my bones will thank me for giving them the boost they need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It really works! I was low in calcium when I took a blood test a year ago. I started taking mykind plant calcium and recently had another blood test and was pleased to see my calcium went to normal. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: elaine himfar

customer_reviews.title: Best form of calcium
customer_reviews.text: From what I've researched, plant based calcium is the best form to take. These pills are easy to swallow. I take 2 a day instead of the recommended 3, because I am getting some calcium in my diet. Calcium is so important for women, especially if you're 50 or older.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Victim of poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I received my first bottle of 240 tablets. I was disappointed because about 1/3 of the tablets were broken. I'm sure the product is a quality product, but I wonder if this is the norm or maybe I should have purchased the smaller count bottle. Possibly the manufacturer should improve their packaging so their product can survive the shipping process.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Made me Sick!
customer_reviews.text: These gave me some of the worst stomach pain I've ever had. You have to throw up to get rid of it, it's terrible in the upper belly region. So many good reviews vs. the bad ones, so perhaps it affects people differently. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: gustavo

customer_reviews.title: If you need to take Calcium, this is the one to take!
customer_reviews.text: I have taken these for years now and my bone density has significantly improved according to test results.
customer_reviews.author: Melodie D.

customer_reviews.title: Highest absorbency of ANY other form of Calcium
customer_reviews.text: This form of calcium is THE most bioavailable to the body, meaning it's absorbed better than any other form of Calcium, including calcium citrate. The pills are big, but most Calcium supplements are, because it's a large mineral. The high absorbency justifies the price to me, because the less expensive forms of Calcium are not absorbed well, especially Calcium Carbonate, which is hardly absorbed at all, even with food, so these other types of calcium are a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Bottle broken and tiny bits of glass everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Bottle was broken when I lifted it out of the box. No bubble wrap used. The glass and pills went flying everywhere. I thought I vacuumed it all up, but my husband stepped on a piece and had to use a tweezers to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strange burnt liner
customer_reviews.text: This product is normally fine and I have it on autoship so didn't open my last bottle until over a month after I ordered it (stocked up). When I opened the bottle, both the cap and seal had a burnt edge on it? No idea what this is but makes me very hesitant to take the pills themselves being that they have been bottled up in that environment for who knows how long?
customer_reviews.author: natalia

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottle :(
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with this supplement other than the packaging. This is how my bottle arrived, completely broken in two. I’m not clear why a huge glass bottle is needed for a product that could easily fit in half the size (plus cotton).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product..a bit expensive...postal mess up
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate this product. I have added it to my daily supplements as an addition to my osteoporosis regimine along with calcium citrate-w/food & w/o, multivitamin, magnesium, and diet. However, our local postal delivered left the Amazon box and our mail on our front step and it was all rained on. Glad for your glass jar...all inside was dry. Making other arrangements with post office.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Hunsberger-Main Street Baptist Church

customer_reviews.title: weird smell
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this over two years and I think this works to me, but this time, the supplement smells so weird and stinky. I'd buy different one next time.
customer_reviews.author: snow

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine.
customer_reviews.text: The product is actually fine and I was set up for automatic delivery. The jar was broken in my last shipment with glass particles mixed in the product so I threw it all away for safety reasons. Since I had nothing to return I guess I am out the cost of this shipment. I have discontinued my automatic purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Davis

customer_reviews.title: Be aware and check ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure yet, but ever since I started taking it, I have allergy symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: sharon corolla

customer_reviews.title: Great source of calcium
customer_reviews.text: Better than the regular over the counter calcium tablets. Have been told by health food store that test on regular calcium supplements do not help bones but rather has a poor effect on bones. Supposedly study done by local university. I really like Garden of Life products and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: johann rizzo

customer_reviews.title: ... find a whole food calcium supplement that provides a good daily amount
customer_reviews.text: It has been hard to find a whole food calcium supplement that provides a good daily amount, while not breaking the bank. The priced I paid at the time was $38 and was a good value for 180 tablets, lasting for 2 months. I don't take all 3 tablets daily though (1 or 2 a day) as I take other supplements and eat a whole food diet, so it will last a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: D & S

customer_reviews.title: Whole Food
customer_reviews.text: The Dr. Said, I needed Calcium. I chose this one because it is whole-food-plant-based and it received good review’s. I won't know until next year if it has helped and I can get a bone density scan.

customer_reviews.title: 1 st bottle came broken, 2nd bottle over half of the contents  were broken
customer_reviews.text: the vitamins are great, my problem lies with the Amazon and the shipping. My 1st bottle was shattered in the box and had to be shipped back. The 2nd bottle almost half the content in the bottle is broken into pieces. I will probably discontinue my subscription because of the issues I have had.

Now they split at the ends and snag, and I've got an open split lengthwise up my thumb nail. Sorry for the poor review; perhaps something else is going on, but...the capsules worked great. I love Garden of Life, and have taken their calcium for a long time. It's a good natural calcium product. Just stumped by this recent purchase...

customer_reviews.title: Many patients can't absorb calcium well and have cramping when taking the recommended daily dose
customer_reviews.text: This calcium is a more bio-available option compared to the typical carbonate or citrate that you will usually find. Many patients can't absorb calcium well and have cramping when taking the recommended daily dose. Also there is concern that typical calcium supplements are actually contributing to calcification of blood vessels. This is now my go to calcium for my own use and for patients. (I am a medical doctor).
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Well done!

Switched to Garden of Life MyKind as they are organic and I started on their multi-vitamin as well. Decided to stay with the same brand. I sometimes have a difficult time swallowing them. How does one know what the absorbency is providing inside one’s bone?

customer_reviews.title: Plant based - great for pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is a plant based product and also raw. I've always found garden of life to be the best quality when it comes to supplements. I trust all of the products because of how they are sourced and made. This one I used during pregnancy to keep from having deficiencies. I felt a lot better physically after I started taking it at around 2 months pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: ProductGuru

product_meta.title: Garden of Life mykind Organic Plant Calcium - Vegan Whole Food Supplement with D3 and K2, Gluten Free, 180 Tablets
product_meta.description:
Size:180 Count

MYKIND ORGANICS ORGANIC PLANT CALCIUM. . .THE BIGGEST INNOVATION IN VITAMINS IN OVER A DECADE.
Supplement your diet with a quality ORGANIC food-based calcium formula, not one made from ground-up, pulverized limestone. You want real, nutritious food-based calcium - mykind Organics Organic Plant Calcium - Certified USDA Organic and Non-GMO Project Verified with absolutely no synthetic binders or fillers.

Certified USDA Organic & Non-GMO Project Verified CLEAN, RIGHT DOWN TO OUR PATENT-PENDING CLEAN TABLET TECHNOLOGY
Where many other vitamin "tablets" use unrecognizable things such as magnesium stearate, stearic acid and lac-beetle resin (shellac) to bind and fill the tablet, mykind Organics are uniquely formed using ORGANIC, WHOLE FOODS.

MYKIND ORGANICS ORGANIC PLANT CALCIUM BENEFITS
mykind Organics Organic Plant Calcium is the FIRST Certified USDA Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified Calcium from plants, not crushed rocks. It's gluten free, dairy free and has no synthetic binders or fillers. Containing Certified Vegan vitamin D3 and vitamin K2 MK-7 to promote proper absorption, mykind Organics Organic Plant Calcium tablets are small, easy-to-digest and easy-to-swallow.

MYKIND ORGANICS OVERVIEW
mykind Organics from Garden of Life offers a full range of Certified USDA Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified supplements made only from real food-over 30 fruits, vegetables and herbs. Absolutely free of synthetic binders and fillers, meaningful amounts of vitamins and minerals are carefully combined to benefit specific dietary needs. All of this goodness is wrapped up using Garden of Life's patent-pending Clean Tablet Technology - an entirely new way to make vitamins using only Certified USDA Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified foods. None of our Clean Tablet Technology ingredients come from soy or corn. mykind Organics - the first of its kind.

BONE LOSS AND YOU
The Surgeon General predicted over a decade ago that bone disease and fractures "will have a tremendous negative impact on the future well being of Americans. " As we age, the renewal of bone structure slows, causing bones to lose density and become more porous and brittle, resulting in unexpected fractures. When talking about bone loss, the increased risk of osteoporosis should be of major concern. Some of the statistics should bring this home: Osteoporosis leads to 1.5 million fractures per year - mostly hip, spine and wrist (National Institutes of Health); Osteoporosis afflicts 52 million Americans (National Osteoporosis Foundation); One in two women past the age of 50 will break a bone due to osteoporosis (National Osteoporosis Foundation); By the year 2020, half of all Americans over age 50 are expected to have low bone density or osteoporosis (National Osteoporosis Foundation). Over the years, clinical studies have underscored the importance of calcium and bone health, including a New England Journal of Medicine study showing that taking calcium and vitamin D supplements tends to improve bone density and maintain strong bones and teeth.

WHAT CAN YOU DO?
There are several things you can do to fight bone loss. 1. East more calcium-rich foods. 2. Exercise more. 3. Supplement your diet with a quality food-based calcium formula. That's why we created mykind Organics Organic Plant Calcium.


MYKIND ORGANICS ORGANIC PLANT CALCIUM AT A GLANCE
